explanation: The robber can steal a maximum of 4 by robbing house at index 0 (value 1) and house at index 2 (value 3).
The robber can steal a maximum of 12 by robbing house at index 0 (value 2), house at index 2 (value 9), and house at index 4 (value 1).
The robber can steal a maximum of 21 by robbing house at index 1 (value 6), house at index 4 (value 6), house at index 7 (value 9).
